value.stringValue:
Hello,
{!myVariable_current.CaseNumber} has been assigned to you.
CH Post To Chatter Invokable Outage Type

actionCalls.name: myRule_6_A1
actionCalls.label: Post To Chatter Invokable Outage Type

rules.name: myRule_37
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2) OR ((3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 6 AND 7 AND 8)
rules.label: Close Case Criteria 1

rules.name: myRule_6
rules.label: Notify On High Impact Service Disruption

rules.name: myRule_51
rules.label: Change Stage to Diagnosis and Technical Analysis

Flow.description: CS-SCTP Case Handling Standard Case Type ProcessBuilder- Code Optimization

value.stringValue: "The Case "& [Case].CaseNumber &" has been assigned to @["& [Case].OwnerId & "] " & "#[WorkgroupCase]" & BR() & "Case Details: " & BR() & "Reported to Nokia: "& LEFT(Text([Case].CreatedDate),LEN(Text([Case].CreatedDate))-1) &" (in User Timezone) " & BR() & "Service Type: "& TEXT([Case].CH_ServiceType__c) & BR() & "Case Type: "& [Case].RecordType.Name & BR() & "Severity: "& TEXT([Case].Severity__c) & BR() & "Product: "& [Case].CH_Product_Name__c & BR() & "External Bridge Number: "& [Case].CH_ExternalBridge__c & BR() & "Customer: "& [Case].CH_Account_Name__c & BR() & "Country: "& TEXT([Case].Country__c)

formulas.name: formula_23_myRule_21_A1_9999921767
formulas.expression: "The Case "& {!myVariable_current.CaseNumber} &" has been assigned to @["& {!myVariable_current.OwnerId} & "] " & "#[WorkgroupCase]" & BR() & "Case Details: " & BR() & "Reported to Nokia: "& LEFT(Text({!myVariable_current.CreatedDate}),LEN(Text({!myVariable_current.CreatedDate}))-1) &" (in User Timezone) " & BR() & "Service Type: "& TEXT({!myVariable_current.CH_ServiceType__c}) & BR() & "Case Type: "& {!myVariable_current.RecordType.Name} & BR() & "Severity: "& TEXT({!myVariable_current.Severity__c}) & BR() & "Product: "& {!myVariable_current.CH_Product_Name__c} & BR() & "External Bridge Number: "& {!myVariable_current.CH_ExternalBridge__c} & BR() & "Customer: "& {!myVariable_current.CH_Account_Name__c} & BR() & "Country: "& TEXT({!myVariable_current.Country__c})

value.stringValue: OR( AND( [Case].IsStopped , ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE([Case].Status ) , "Pending Customer"), ISPICKVAL([Case].Status , "Closed") ), AND( ISBLANK([Case].AccountId ), ISPICKVAL([Case].CH_Outage__c , " ") , ISPICKVAL([Case].CH_CaseCause__c , " "), ISPICKVAL([Case].Status , "Closed") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_43
formulas.expression: OR( AND( {!myVariable_current.IsStopped} , ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Status} ) , "Pending Customer"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} , "Closed") ), AND( ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.AccountId} ), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.CH_Outage__c} , " ") , ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.CH_CaseCause__c} , " "), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Status} , "Closed") ) )

value.stringValue:
AND( ISPICKVAL([Case].CH_ServiceType__c, "Customer Support"), OR(ISNEW() , ISCHANGED([Case].CH_Outage__c), ISCHANGED([Case].Severity__c)), NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].CH_LegacyCaseStatus__c , "Closed"))
)

(NOT( ISPICKVAL([Case].Status , 'Closed')) || NOT(ISPICKVAL([Case].Status , 'Cancelled'))) && (ISPICKVAL([Case].CH_Outage__c , 'Yes') || ISPICKVAL([Case].CH_Outage__c , 'NULL')) && ([Case].RecordType.DeveloperName != 'CH_NokiaIncidentWithRestoration') && (ISNEW() || ISCHANGED([Case].OwnerId )) && (BEGINS([Case].OwnerId , "005")) && NOT(BEGINS([Case].Owner:User.Username , "virtual_portal_attendant@")) && NOT(BEGINS([Case].Owner:User.Username , "ch_queue@"))

AND( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE([Case].CH_Outage__c ), 'Yes'), ISPICKVAL( [Case].CH_Outage__c , 'No'), ISPICKVAL([Case].Severity__c, 'Major') ), AND( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE([Case].Severity__c), 'Critical'), ISPICKVAL( [Case].Severity__c, 'Major'), ISPICKVAL([Case].CH_Outage__c , 'No') ), AND( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE([Case].Severity__c), 'Major'), ISPICKVAL( [Case].Severity__c, 'Minor') ) ), ISPICKVAL( [Case].CH_Stage__c , 'Investigate & Restore') )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_51
formulas.expression: AND( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.CH_Outage__c} ), 'Yes'), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.CH_Outage__c} , 'No'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Severity__c}, 'Major') ), AND( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Severity__c}), 'Critical'), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Severity__c}, 'Major'), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.CH_Outage__c} , 'No') ), AND( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE({!myVariable_current.Severity__c}), 'Major'), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.Severity__c}, 'Minor') ) ), ISPICKVAL( {!myVariable_current.CH_Stage__c} , 'Investigate & Restore') )

value.stringValue: (ISCHANGED([Case].Severity__c) || ISCHANGED([Case].CH_Outage__c) || ISCHANGED([Case].CH_OutageType__c) || ISNEW()) && ISPICKVAL([Case].Severity__c, 'Critical') && ISPICKVAL([Case].CH_Outage__c, 'Yes') && (ISPICKVAL([Case].CH_OutageType__c, 'High Impact Outage') || ISPICKVAL([Case].CH_OutageType__c, 'Code Red'))

Flow.label: Case Handling Standard Case Type PB
